channel.title: ::npc ####
channel.description: CAN sum1 give me the npc command when u type ::npc #### it adds the npc id u typed right to the autospawn.cfg? Thanks i made one of these once i haven't been on for a long time due to gettin grounded.

item.title: ::npc ####
item.dc:creator: @woofdawg23 woofdawg23
item.description:
@woofdawg23 wrote:

[quote=“delta, post:8, topic:169311”]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("npc") && playerRights > 2){ int newnpc = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(newnpc, absX, absY); sM("You spawn npc # "+newnpc+"."); }[/quote]tyvm delta! Btw i look up to you and java is my bitch! You guys are good coders. I also looooove ur server![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2007, 01:06:24 AM[/size][hr][quote=“b3nj4m1n_8, post:7, topic:169311”]hey woof i know how to do it just unban me from ur server… my name is benjamin

i know alot about coding and anything u need to know… heck i could be ur coder, haha![/quote]and bejamin i did not ban you my my server!!! That server is not mine! it’s sum leecher who used my source ffs now stop bothering me >:(

item.title: ::npc ####
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("npc") && playerRights > 2){ int newnpc = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(newnpc, absX, absY); sM("You spawn npc # "+newnpc+"."); }
